definition: to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
parents-in-law of one's offspring
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: They were a quiet and fond couple.
sentences.chinese: 他们夫妇一向和和睦睦，相亲相爱。

sentences.english: They love each other, living in fairyland.
sentences.chinese: 他们相亲相爱，生活如在仙境。

sentences.english: Hui and Rong fell in love with each other. His lower body became completely paralyzed.
sentences.chinese: 辉和蓉相亲相爱，但自从辉受伤后，下半身完全瘫痪。

sentences.english: We wake up to find that we were dear to eachother.
sentences.chinese: 我醒了，却知道我们原是相亲相爱的。

sentences.english: Dear to each other in the USA, let a person infinite memories, good happiness.
sentences.chinese: 相亲相爱的留影让人无限回忆，美好了幸福。

sentences.english: They promise to love and cherish each other until death do them part.
sentences.chinese: 他们发誓相亲相爱，至死不渝。

sentences.english: Blondie and Dagwood love each other.
sentences.chinese: 勃朗黛和大梧相亲相爱。

sentences.english: They were in love, but getting married was complicated.
sentences.chinese: 他们相亲相爱，但是谈婚配嫁娶可没那么简单。

sentences.english: we wake up to find that we were dear to each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们醒了，却知道我们原是相亲相爱的。

sentences.english: Dry bread is better with love than friend chicken with fear and trembling.
sentences.chinese: 相亲相爱吃干面包胜过心惊胆战吃油炸鸡。

sentences.english: We wake up to find that we were dear to eath other.
sentences.chinese: 我们醒了，却知道我们原是相亲相爱。

sentences.english: Yong-tie the knot, BizArt Shuangfei, love each other.
sentences.chinese: 永结同心，比翼双飞，相亲相爱。

sentences.english: She was only 17 years old and she and Charlie had fallen deeply in love.
sentences.chinese: 她才17岁却与查理相亲相爱，难舍难分。

definition: to treat each other as an honored guest (idiom)/mutual respect between husband and wife
to live in harmony/to get along with each other
to love each other
peaceful relations/harmonious
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
lit. to lift the tray to eyebrow level (idiom); mutual respect in a marriage
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
fig. the man sings and the woman follows/fig. marital harmony
family-like close relationship (idiom)
in perfect harmony/in sync/lit. qin and se sing in harmony
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
(of relations) joyous and harmonious
happy/blissful
loving affection (in a couple)/conjugal love
